dmca.title: [EV1-C1502014U] Illegal copys of our games, http://www.al-mobile.com/vb/showthread.ph
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal. Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Wednesday, October 25, 2006 9:17 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [EV1-C1502014U] Illegal copys of our games, http://www.al-mobile.com/vb/showthread.php?t=1784 Subject: [EV1-C1502014U] Illegal copys of our games, http://www.al-mobile.com/vb/showthread.php?t=1784 ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Illegal copys of our games, http://www.al-mobile.com/vb/showthread.php?t=1784 Added by system at Tuesday, Oct 24 2006 02:00 am X-MailFrom: d.maslanka@fishlabs.net X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [70.87.6.110] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Tue, 24 Oct 2006 10:00:51 +0200 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5 Content-class: urn:content-classes:message Subject: Illegal copys of our games, http://www.al-mobile.com/vb/showthread.php?t=1784 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/related; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C6F742.CC15018E"; type="multipart/alternative" Date: Tue, 24 Oct 2006 10:02:02 +0200 Message-ID: X-MS-Has-Attach: yes X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: Illegal copys of our games, http://www.al-mobile.com/vb/showthread.php?t=1784 Thread-Index: Acb3Qq65g15Bg4nLSUWMkj5kZxURvA== From: "D Maslanka" To: Cc: , "C Lohr" Received-SPF: none (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: 213.191.74.10 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of fishlabs.net) client-ip=213.191.74.10; envelope-from=d.maslanka@fishlabs.net; helo=mr01.hansenet.de; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 24 Oct 2006 08:00:58.0238 (UTC) FILETIME=[8A08E9E0:01C6F742] (multipart/related) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Dear Sir or Madam, Our Content Protection Team has reported that you are hosting a web site: http://www.al-mobile.com/vb/showthread.php?t=1784 offers copies of FISHLABS games for mobile phones. The making of unauthorized copies is a violation of FISHLABS rights under international laws and International Treaties. You have participated in the violation of law, or, at best, you have been negligent in preventing others from offering unauthorized copies of FISHLABS games on the internet. You are potentially liable for damages that FISHLABS may suffer as a result of this violation of law. Damages could be significant, given the world wide distribution of pirate copies over the Internet. FISHLABS is disappointed that it cannot rely on you to respect its rights, and will be considering whether further legal action is appropriate in this case. We hereby formally request that you immediately remove or ask to remove FISHLABS games from the web sites: http://www.al-mobile.com/vb/showthread.php?t=1784 and confirm us the same by email. This letter constitutes notice to you that your actions are illegal and may subject you to criminal prosecution and civil liability. We will be monitoring your web site to see if you are in compliance with the law and reserve the right to take all steps necessary to protect FISHLABS rights. FISHLABS Games on your side are: Heli Strike 3D Regards http://www.al-mobile.com/vb/showthread.php?t=1784 Results of IP Tracking for 70.87.149.18 IP address 70.87.149.18 Hostname 12.95.5746.static.theplanet.com ISP ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. OrgID: TPCM Address: 1333 North Stemmons Freeway Address: Suite 110 City: Dallas StateProv: TX PostalCode: 75207 Country: US ReferralServer: rwhois://rwhois.theplanet.com:4321 NetRange: 70.84.0.0 - 70.87.255.255 CIDR: 70.84.0.0/14 NetName: NETBLK-THEPLANET-BLK-13 NetHandle: NET-70-84-0-0-1 Parent: NET-70-0-0-0-0 NetType: Direct Allocation NameServer: NS1.THEPLANET.COM NameServer: NS2.THEPLANET.COM Comment: RegDate: 2004-07-29 Updated: 2006-02-17 RTechHandle: PP46-ARIN RTechName: Pathos, Peter RTechPhone: +1-214-782-7800 RTechEmail: admins@theplanet.com OrgAbuseHandle: ABUSE271-ARIN OrgAbuseName: Abuse OrgAbusePhone: +1-214-782-7802 OrgAbuseEmail: abuse@theplanet.com OrgNOCHandle: TECHN33-ARIN OrgNOCName: Technical Support OrgNOCPhone: +1-214-782-7800 OrgNOCEmail: admins@theplanet.com OrgTechHandle: TECHN33-ARIN OrgTechName: Technical Support OrgTechPhone: +1-214-782-7800 OrgTechEmail: admins@theplanet.com # ARIN WHOIS database, last updated 2006-10-23 19:10 # Enter ? for additional hints on searching ARIN's WHOIS database. -- Daniel Maslanka Office Manager Meet us at: G Star , Seoul - November 9th to 12th ________________________________________________________ FISHLABS Entertainment GmbH - 3D mobile game development Geibelstrasse 46 22303 Hamburg, Germany Fon: +49.40.88 88 00 - 101 Fax: +49.40.88 88 00 - 110 Mail: d.maslanka@fishlabs.net Web: www.fishlabs.net ________________________________________________________ MIME element (text/html)
Dear Sir or Madam,

Our Content Protection Team has reported that you are hosting a web site: http://www.al-m obile.com/vb/showthread.php?t=1784 offers copies of FISHLABS games for mobile phones.

The making of unauthorized copies is a violation of FISHLABS rights under international laws and International Treaties.  

You have participated in the violation of law, or, at best, you have been negligent in preventing others from offering unauthorized copies of FISHLABS games on the internet. You are potentially liable for damages that FISHLABS may suffer as a result of this violation of law. Damages could be significant, given the world wide distribution of pirate copies over the Internet.

FISHLABS is disappointed that it cannot rely on you to respect its rights, and will be considering whether further legal action is appropriate in this case.  

We hereby formally request that you immediately remove or ask to remove FISHLABS games from the web sites: http://www.al-m obile.com/vb/showthread.php?t=1784 and confirm us the same by email.

This letter constitutes notice to you that your actions are illegal and may subject you to criminal prosecution and civil liability. We will be monitoring your web site to see if you are in compliance with the law and reserve the right to take all steps necessary to protect FISHLABS rights.  

FISHLABS Games on your side are:

Heli Strike 3D

 

Regards

< /SPAN>
 

http://www.al-m obile.com/vb/showthread.php?t=1784
